gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls
Interface IViewControl

All Superinterfaces:
IPreserveState
All Known Implementing Classes:
AltAzController, ButtonControl, CheckedControl, ColorControl, CompositeContourControl, ControlCheckbox, ControlCheckboxButton, ControlCheckboxCombobox, ControlCheckboxSpinner, ControlColorScale, ControlList, ControlSlider, CursorOutputControl, FieldEntryControl, FormatControl, FrameController, LabelCombobox, PanViewControl, RangeControl, SceneController, SpinnerControl, TabbedViewControl, ViewControl, ViewControlMaker
public interface IViewControl
extends IPreserveState

Any class that implements this interface will be used to adjust settings on the IViewComponent.

Method Detail

getObjectState

ObjectState getObjectState(boolean isDefault)
This method will get the current values of the state variables for this object. These variables will be wrapped in an ObjectState.

Specified by:
getObjectState in interface IPreserveState
Parameters:
isDefault - Should selective state be returned, that used to store user preferences common from project to project?
Returns:
if true, the default state containing user preferences, if false, the entire state, suitable for project specific saves.

setObjectState

void setObjectState(ObjectState new_state)
This method will set the current state variables of the object to state variables wrapped in the ObjectState passed in.

Specified by:
setObjectState in interface IPreserveState
Parameters:
new_state -

addActionListener

void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener act_listener)

getSharedKey

java.lang.String getSharedKey()
Get the category key associating this control with other controls. This String will be used to "link" controls together.

Returns:
Key used by ControlManager to link controls.

setSharedKey

void setSharedKey(java.lang.String key)
Set the category key associating this control with other controls. This String will be used to "link" controls together.

Parameters:
key - The key used by the ControlManager to link this control with other similar controls.
